channel.title: Eventcia
channel.description:
[img]http://s8.postimage.org/4rg4ygax1/Untitled_2.png[/img][img]http://s7.postimage.org/fiivnz5az/Untitled.png[/img] [hr] [b][size=18pt]Introduction[/size][/b] Eventcia is now here in development part. The server will be economic based server. It will be unique because of some features. We are currently working on fixing bugs and make more stable to hold more players then other Project Insanity's servers. There some custom maps and we will probably update more. [hr] [b][size=18pt]Team[/size][/b]
[ul][li]Xion - Developer (artem543)[/li] [li]Dylan - Developer (iz3 legend)[/li][/ul]
[hr] [b][size=18pt]Updates[/size][/b] [code] 11/29/11 Xion: Added player folowing clipped 11/30/11 Dylan: Added killamess's door system for double and single door's 11/30/11 Dylan: Cycle runs on 500ms now instead of 600 11/30/11 Xion: Home map created 11/30/11 Xion: Configured all crowns client sided 11/30/11 Xion: Home map Edited 11/30/11 Xion: Added new loginscreen 12/1/11 Xion: Fixed over 450 warnings in eclipse 12/1/11 Dylan: Finished Npc clipping 12/1/11 Dylan: Clipping Is Now Region Loaded 12/1/11 Dylan: Melee Combat Cliping [/code] [hr] [b][size=18pt]Supporters[/size][/b] [b]Just say Support or Good Luck if you wish want to be here.[/b]
[ul][li]Native^[/li] [li]Loveandpower[/li] [li]mr extremez[/li][/ul]
[hr] [b][size=18pt]Media[/size][/b] [b]More to coming soon.[/b]
[b]Great Server Stability[/b] [img]http://s11.postimage.org/o7qls3hmr/Untitled.png[/img] [b]New Login screen. Hovering works.[/b] [url=http://www.freeimagehosting.net/fef2c][img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/6961/97098755.gif[/img][/url] [hr] [b]Note:[/b] This is a started project. So it will be updated. Please, No flame.

item.title: Eventcia
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:20, topic:423774”][quote author=The Outsider link=topic=526430.msg3835324#msg3835324 date=1322862039]
My face when I realise it’s not an old school server. :eek: and but still… that’s just personal preference. Still loving the logo.
[/quote]

Should it be a remake? We can do it…
I am currently asking dylan if it should be an remake.

I am not being rude…but .67% at three people online isn’t that great stability wise…just rounding here of course to be fair let’s say four people makes up 1 % that would be …400 people and even then with unclosed nulls/exceptions that will go up even faster than that at around 50-100.

^ Just some critical criticism. Good luck dylan <3

Its most probably my computer specs. that are realy low. but still its better then a normal PI.[/quote]
I suggest you shouldn’t do the whole “317 loading 666” bullshit (of course it’s entirely up to you), but those type of servers are too generic.

Keep it clean, keep simple, keep it fresh.

Read full topic

item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:15, topic:423774”]Cycle rate:

RuneScape Wiki

Game tick

The game tick is the fundamental quantum of time used in RuneScape. It is a unit equal to length of 0.6 seconds. All actions that require server processing are governed by this value. Purely client-side actions (such as opening a right-click menu or...

Good luck.[/quote]

I see that now, i heard 500 was more efficent. But I guess I was wrong.

Read full topic
